extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerability by verifying the installed firmware version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running Schneider Electric PowerLogic P5 v01.500.104 or prior?

extracted_playbook.title: Update PowerLogic P5 Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Contact Schneider Electric's Customer Care Center to download and install PowerLogic P5 Wave 4.2.3 P5L30 firmware, which includes a fix for the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Industry Cybersecurity Best Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Apply Schneider Electric's recommended cybersecurity best practices to enhance system security.

extracted_playbook.title: Consult Schneider Electric Security Notification
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to Schneider Electric Security Notification SEVD-2024-163-02 for detailed information on the vulnerability and its mitigation.
